text: The 1962 FIFA World Cup Final was the deciding match of the 1962 FIFA World Cup. ==Details== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Gilmar RB 2 Djalma Santos CB 3 Mauro Ramos (c) CB 5 Zózimo LB 6 Nílton Santos RH 4 Zito LH 8 Didi OR 7 Garrincha OL 21 Mário Zagallo CF 19 Vavá CF 20 Amarildo Manager: Manager: Manager: Aymoré Moreira {| style="width:100%; font-size:90%;" | Assistant referees: Leo Horn (Netherlands) Bobby Davidson (Scotland) |} |style="width:60%; vertical-align:top;"| Match rules *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra time if necessary. *Replay if scores still level. *No substitutions permitted. ==References== ==Other websites== *1962 FIFA World Cup Final planetworldcup.com Category:FIFA World Cup finals
title: 1962 FIFA World Cup Final
